description: Demolition of existing single storey extension and replacement with a single storey rear/side (infill) extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

Drawing number 01 - Existing and proposed floor plans, Drawing number 02 - Existing and proposed floor plans, Drawing number 03 - Proposed ground floor plan, Drawing number 04 - Existing and proposed elevations, Drawing number 05 - Existing and proposed side elevation, Drawing number 06 - Existing and proposed section, Drawing number 07 - Existing and proposed section, Drawing number BP1 - Location plan,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), D3 and D4 of the Publication London Plan (2020), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the single storey projection to the side and rear or the changes to the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the Publication London Plan (2020), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
